settings.title: UltraPure fittings Fit to DIN
settings.content: This is the Alfa Laval small selection of fittings within the DIN 11865 standard, pharma surface, they comply with DIN EN 10357-A tubes

settings.title: UltraPure fittings ISO EN 10357-D
settings.content: This is the Alfa Laval small selection of fittings within the ISO UltraPure, pharma surface, they comply with DIN EN 10357-D tubes

settings.title: UltraPure fittings  Tri-Clover BPE
settings.content: The Tri-Clover BioPharm product range includes a comprehensive selection of fittings with surface designation SF1 (ID Ra ≤ 20 µin) or SF4 (ID Ra ≤ 15 µin EP), where SF1 is mechanically polished and SF4 is electropolished.Tubes in this range comply with ASME BPE dimension standards
settings.button_text: Click here to find your product

settings.title: Looking for other products or need help to select the right product?
settings.content: We cover the full range of Alfa Laval products and our experts are ready to support you in selecting the right product for your needs - so do not hesitate to reach out!
